translations: n.奉承；涂灰浆；隔离层；预堆边焊
v.用黄油涂抹；巴结（butter 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 涂黄油的面包；基本生活资料；生计
溶化牛油；溶化奶油；黄油溶液
对…说好话；恭维，阿谀奉承
n. 奶油夹心饼；加糖奶豆浆

sentences.sentence: She spread pieces of bread on the counter and began buttering them.
sentences.translation: 她放了几片面包在柜台上，开始给它们涂黄油。

sentences.sentence: They ended by buttering the head of one of the daughters who resented some of their familiarities.
sentences.translation: 最后，他们在一个对他们的调戏表示愤慨的女儿的头上抹上了奶油。

sentences.sentence: He is always buttering up sb.
